name: Infinity Disk
description: Infinity Disk is a Virtual Reality Frisbee Game. Explore a Mysterious Science Fiction Environment and Defeat the Obstacles. Bounce the Frisbee to Infinity!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64Bit Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
